mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_ROLE_MENU(id, role_id, menu_id) VALUE (#{id}, #{roleId}, #{menuId})
mapper.select: SELECT FM.id, FM.parent, FM.name, FM.icon_name, FM.route_name, FM.page_title, FM.page_path, FM.type, FM.page_type, FM.component_path, FM.description, FM.order_num FROM F_MENU FM LEFT JOIN F_ROLE_MENU FRM ON FM.id = FRM.menu_id AND FRM.role_id = #{roleId} WHERE FM.status = 1 ORDER BY FM.order_num
